action.msg: And... then what did you see?
Pitch black, everlasting darkness wherever I looked. Darker than the putrid womb of the ancient ones...
It was so dark that closing my eyes made no difference...
But... I knew there was something there... something... or SOMEONE watching me...
Running out of options, I bumped into a wall... I realized this must have been the side of a building, so I followed alongside it.. inching closer and closer...
No light. But, I knew I was somewhere familiar... then... I heard a noise...
"Hey! Whos there!? Show yourself!" I yelled.
And the next part... the next part... the next part... the next part...
Hey! F-fever?
I was ATTACKED BY THE UNDEAD! ZOMBIES ATTACKING ME FROM ALL ANGLES, GUTS FLYING EVERYWHERE! BAHAHAHA!
YOU FUCKING-
YOU DESERVE THAT.
Ow, owww! Okay, sorry! Fuck, I forgot you space bunnies are super strong...
And here I thought that you were ACTUALLY telling me something cool you did in the past...
I DID do that! I'm telling you babe, I was surrounded by brains, guts and more! I nearly lost my mind!
That implies that you were sane once. Forgive me if I uh, find that hard to believe.
I tell you, punchin' a hole in a zombie brain just isn't as satisfying as the real deal.
Let's just go home. It's cold as FUCK in here.
You're cold, huh? You know, my arms are feeling pretty warm and lonely right now...
Ah, I love it when you say that~.
Oh cool, what now?
I thought I heard something fall.
Oh no, I'm not falling for your shit this time, Fever.
No, I mean it!
I said I'm done with this shit, Fe-
Shouldn't you be at-
Oh wait, it's just a ghost... holding a painting of Taki?
A ghost?! There's GHOSTS in this town as well?..
Actually, it's kinda cute.
Really. What DON'T you think is cute?
Those bunnies from like three weeks ago. I still have nightmares...
I didn't even notice its energy level. That means they're probably a pretty weak ghost.
That or a pretty strong one. But I doubt that.
Oh, what's up little guy?
It sure seems to love that painting...
BABE, MOVE!
HUH? FUCK-
Phew! It almost got me. Tea, are you-
action.narrate: Thanks to Teas call, the attack directed at Fever manages to barely miss.

action.msg: You'd better get her out of that if you know what's good for you.
You'd BetTeR Get her OUt OF tHAt if YOU knOW what's gOOd FOr yoU.
So be it.
